Tool:           OpenGL Mathematics
Last Updated:   May 150 2020
Version:        0.9.9.8
1
Comments:

 - Download: https://github.com/g-truc/glm/releases

 - General Comments:
   - Make sure to remove "GLM_FORCE_RADIANS" from projects when GLM no longer accepts degrees as parameter

 - To use:
  - Extract version
  - Copy "glm" folder to glm project directory
